overview: We meet a man named Devin, who sits alone at home drinking his feelings away when he is visited by a strange figure. The figure addresses himself as The Man, a time-traveling agent of the future. As the evening progresses, Devin begins to question his own place in his story and believes karma has caught up to him. Are Devinâ€™s actions finally catching up to him, or is his fear causing a troublesome conversation with a man of the past?
tagline: Your past always catches up to you
title: Ripple
